message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $175.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would $150 be within your consideration?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down a bit.  How about $160? That's still a fair price for the value of this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still working within my budget, so would $150 be acceptable to you?
